name: MICROCHIP PANIC!
description:
Defeat the glitchy microchips and collect their coins!

Defend the system for as long as you can, though it may seem like a hopeless fight...

Fire a torrent of bullets at an endless stream of enemies and try to survive them in this top-down arcade shooter.

Compete for the high score on the GameJolt leaderboard!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • P - Pause
  • M - Mute
  • Shooting is automatic!

This game was created in 72 hours for the Indies VS Gamers game jam!
